title: Constructing weakly solvating electrolytes for next-generation Zn-ion batteries
content:
Energy Environ. Sci., 2024, Advance Article
DOI: 10.1039/D4EE03209H, Minireview
Diyu Xu, Dezhou Zheng, Fuxin Wang, Xuefeng Shang, Yi Wang, Xihong Lu
This concept systemically summarizes the functions, basic principles and design strategies for weakly solvating electrolytes (WSEs). The insights will benefit the design of next-generation high-performance Zn-ion batteries.
To cite this article before page numbers are assigned, use the DOI form of citation above.
